Quickstrike:





While they were on the subject of introduction, it would have been rude of 
him to dismiss Dark Mouse, sitting by herself. He pointed a long finger to 
her. "And that's Dark Mouse. It's uh good thing y'all came. We could use 
some more help 'round here."
